attributes.action: strongly oppose the apparently imminent execution of Saddam Hussein
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Capital punishment is immoral and inhumane. No matter what a person's actions, they do not deserve to die at a human's hands. Anyone with a moral thought in their minds should oppose his death sentence. Please look into yourself and see that to be blameless, that to do the right thing, requires you to strongly oppose his execution.
